name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Strider
summary: Add Strider to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up! In the year 2048, the world has been conquered by Grandmaster Meio. A young A-Class Strider, Hiryu, is entrusted with the dangerous task of bringing him down. With his trusty plasma sword Cypher by his side, he'll cut his way through his enemies!
